name: The Developer's Decision
description:
The Developer's Decision,

It's up to you now.

Welcome Developer.

Developer 2 has been working on the most recent version of the game.

Developer 2 is awaiting your feedback on their changes.

Your choice matters.

The code before you is finnicky, and we are hoping for the best possible experience for our future players, please proceed with caution.

Global Game Jam 2022.

The Developer's Decision has been create for global game jam 2022.

Yes or No.

Yes or No, your choice is that simple.
